suggest.ext-mbstring: Mandatory when using Payload or VAPID extensions
suggest.ext-openssl: Mandatory when using Payload or VAPID extensions
suggest.web-token/jwt-signature-algorithm-ecdsa: Mandatory if you want to use VAPID using web-token/jwt-framework
suggest.lcobucci/jwt: Mandatory if you want to use VAPID using lcobucci/jwt
suggest.psr/log-implementation: Recommended to receive logs from the library
